changeSet.author: Quang Nguyen
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS elective_group ( elective_group_id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, group_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, min_modules INT NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );

changeSet.author: Quang Nguyen
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS module ( module_id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, module_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, module_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, number_of_credits INT NOT NULL, is_compulsory BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE, responsible_faculty BIGINT NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP );

changeSet.author: Quang Nguyen
changeSet.sql:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS module_class ( module_class_id BIGSERIAL PRIMARY KEY, module_class_code VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE, max_participants INT NOT NULL,
start_date DATE NOT NULL, end_date DATE NOT NULL,
semester_id BIGINT NOT NULL, module_id BIGINT NOT NULL, lecturer_id BIGINT NOT NULL,
created_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, updated_at TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CONSTRAINT fk_module_class_module FOREIGN KEY (module_id) REFERENCES module(module_id),
CONSTRAINT fk_module_class_semester FOREIGN KEY (semester_id) REFERENCES semester(semester_id),
CONSTRAINT fk_module_class_lecturer FOREIGN KEY (lecturer_id) REFERENCES "user"(user_id) );
